item.title: Duel Arena Help
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); // 0 for walk?, 1 for trade, 2 for duel, 3 for attacking, 4 for trade, 5 for right-click kicking, 6+ nothing outStream.writeByteA(3); outStream.writeString("Duel With"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();

Figure the rest out yourself + Where to put that.

Read full topic
